channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Last Anniversary
channel.desc: Sophie discards one unsuitable suitor, just as another enters her life; Grace continues to struggle with motherhood, and her own mother, Enigma; Sophie and Veronika make a big discovery in the Baby Munro mystery.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
channel.desc: Agnes is feeling down in the dumps, and granddad's bowel movements aren't helping matters. The place is a mess, she can't seem to get any sleep, and to make things worse, Maria's home remedies end in disaster.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: UEFA Champions League Football
channel.desc: Gabby Logan presents all the goals, drama and in-depth analysis from the Champions League final as Paris Saint-Germain take on Internazionale in Munich for Europe's biggest prize. Luis Enrique's PSG cantered to their fourth successive French top-flight title this season with six games to spare, but major European success has so far proven elusive.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
channel.desc: The shadow of the Bellows family has loomed large in the small town of Mill Valley for generations. It's in a mansion that young Sarah Bellows turns her tortured life and horrible secrets into a series of scary stories. These terrifying tales soon have a way of becoming all too real for a group of unsuspecting teens who stumble upon Sarah's spooky home.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
channel.desc: Detailed weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Joins BBC News
channel.desc: BBC One joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Take Me to the Opera
channel.desc: Zeinab Badawi ventures into the English countryside to go behind the scenes at the historic opera venue of Glyndebourne. She asks how far Glyndebourne is leading the way in trying to make opera fit for the future through innovative initiatives.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
channel.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBC's range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Security Brief
channel.desc: Former Senior Officer in the British Military Mikey Kay unpacks global conflicts and security threats, offering clear, compelling analysis of the events and decisions shaping today's uncertain world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Tech Now
channel.desc: Nick Kwek explores the growing area of digital clones, where your digital self will act, talk and write like you, and complete tasks on your behalf.

channel.title: Breakfast
channel.desc: The BBC's Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: UEFA Champions League Football
channel.desc: Gabby Logan presents all the goals, drama and in-depth analysis from the Champions League final as Paris Saint-Germain take on Internazionale in Munich for Europe's biggest prize. Luis Enrique's PSG cantered to their fourth successive French top-flight title this season with six games to spare, but major European success has so far proven elusive.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Martel discovers old newspapers dating a two-bed mid terrace in south Wales, but they don't tell the whole story of a property that needs completely salvaging. Jacqui is just outside Cambridge, where there's a jungle of a garden to tackle.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: The stage is set for today's action-packed showdown at the Detling Showground! This extended version sees two sets of red and blues searching for bargains. Steph Connell is with both of the red teams, while John Cameron captains the blues. After the first teams have shopped, Charlie looks at a small collection dating from the 18th century and learns about the big story behind them, before the second red and blue teams hit the fair!

channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.title: Weather for the Week Ahead

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Songs of Praise
channel.desc: Sean Fletcher travels to Scotland to meet Sally Magnusson. Sally and Sean take a walk in rural Dunbartonshire. Sally takes Sean to Baldernock Parish Church. Back in the countryside, Sally reflects on her mother's final years living with dementia.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Points of View
channel.desc: Viewers have their say on BBC television programmes.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Nicki Chapman's buyers are already renting in the beautiful countryside of Herefordshire, but they need Nicki's help to find them a house of their own that comes with enough land for a holiday let.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
channel.desc: An orphaned baby triceratops must outwit a deadly T rex. Today, paleontologists in Montana are uncovering her fossils, allowing us to imagine her life and the dangers she faced. Stunning VFX recreate her encounters.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Inside Out
channel.desc: When 11-year-old Riley moves from Minnesota to San Francisco with her parents, she endures a bad first day at her new school. Her emotions, Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness, consider how to navigate this new environment.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Countryfile
channel.desc: Exploring how the countryside around Bradford shaped the city. Anita Rani meets renowned environmental artist Steve Messam. Sean Fletcher follows the journey of a gritstone sheep's fleece. Adam meets some tenant farmers championing slow farming.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
channel.desc: North Africa, 100 million years ago. A Spinosaurus father must embark on a dangerous voyage to feed his babies. At the end of their journey, an extraordinary feast awaits - if he can run the gauntlet without his babies becoming someone else's meal.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Antiques Roadshow
channel.desc: Silver expert Kate Flitcroft is shaken, not stirred, by a stunning fire extinguisher cocktail shaker that turns up, while ceramics expert Eric Knowles meets his match with a cheeky toy monkey popping out of a musical pineapple.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Death Valley
channel.desc: After a mysterious walker is found dead on a Welsh mountain trail, Janie ropes John into joining her mam Yvonne's walking group to investigate the unidentified woman.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Bombing of Pan Am 103
channel.desc: The ongoing joint Scottish and FBI investigation closes in on the identity of the 'mystery shopper'. Together, the teams work to uncover the co-conspirators behind the Lockerbie bomb plot. Vital progress is threatened by troubled relations between international agencies. A secret CIA asset could hold the key to revealing the identities of those responsible for the bombing of Pan Am 103.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Saving Private Ryan
channel.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Morning Live
channel.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Expert Witness
channel.desc: Soil analysis helps solve a 37-year-old murder investigation in Scotland. In Huddersfield, analysis of insect life on a body found on the moors helps detectives catch a killer.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: A flat in Clapham, a terrace in Kent and a bungalow in Stoke-on-Trent are all sold under the hammer. Jacqui, Martin and Dion meet the successful bidders, including a mother and daughter taking on their first family development.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Today's teams are trying to bag the bargains at an antiques centre in Long Marston, Warwickshire. David Harper's reds push for that extra pound discount, while Danny Sabastian's blues lose track of the time! Christina Trevanion heads to nearby Uttoxeter and gets lost in a collection that clearly demonstrates what happens when a passionate collector just can't stop collecting!

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at One
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at One
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Doorbell Detectives
channel.desc: Matt Allwright meets a group of doorbell detectives from Greater Manchester whose footage foiled a prolific criminal roaming the streets at night when his identity was exposed on their doorbell cameras. Former police inspector Anton Sullivan investigates how best to use a smart doorbell. And the son of a vulnerable pensioner tells how a doorbell video saved his dad from a ruthless gang of doorstep scammers.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Scam Interceptors
channel.desc: The team tap into a scam call centre in Jalandhar, north west India, that is tries to steal thousands from a woman in the UK. But the scammer slips up, revealing the address of a UK accomplice.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Hoping to escape to the dramatic countryside of north Wales, Jules Hudson's buyers want to find a new home where they can create a yoga and well being retreat. He also visits the Menai Suspension Bridge, under renovation for its 200th anniversary.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Amelia are in Scunthorpe to convert Susan and Joe's large, bland plot into a romantic country garden for Susan to accompany husband Joe's metal animal collection that domineers the space. Susan wants to introduce some colourful planting with lots of scent to compliment Joe's metal sculptures. Can the Garden Rescue team achieve all this on a ?6000 budget?

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bridge of Lies
channel.desc: Ross Kemp presents the quiz show where a team - a family of four, Anna, Gemma, Zoe, and Andreas- take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one, they all face the Bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Pointless
channel.desc: A twist on the classic quiz show formula, contestants search through the depths of their knowledge in an attempt to score as few points as possible.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Six
channel.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.title: The One Show
channel.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp bring you the stories that matter from across the country.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: EastEnders
channel.desc: Harvey sets his sights on a new venture, Lauren and Peter are overwhelmed by recent events, and George offers an olive branch.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Panorama
channel.desc: Ros Atkins sets out to discover the truth about how our money is spent and why politicians keep running into trouble when they try to cut spending.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Doorbell Detectives
channel.desc: Matt Allwright meets a group of doorbell detectives from Greater Manchester whose footage foiled a prolific criminal roaming the streets at night when his identity was exposed on their doorbell cameras. Former police inspector Anton Sullivan investigates how best to use a smart doorbell. And the son of a vulnerable pensioner tells how a doorbell video saved his dad from a ruthless gang of doorstep scammers.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Bombing of Pan Am 103
channel.desc: Over a decade after the Lockerbie bombing, following much debate and international negotiation, the accused will finally stand trial. The venue will be a purpose-built Scottish court in the Netherlands. Bereaved relatives around the world campaign for access to the trial. Scottish police and the FBI continue to work tirelessly to secure vital witness testimony and deliver meticulously collected forensic evidence. Will the investigators finally secure justice for the victims and their families?

channel.title: BBC News at Ten
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
channel.desc: Roy Wood Jr is host, with guest panellists comedian and actor Guz Khan and broadcaster Kirsty Wark joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop as they delve into the news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: I Kissed a Boy
channel.desc: A love triangle in the masseria gets messy, but when Dannii delivers a cocktail party with the ultimate twist, decisions in the will be made like never before.
